entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Airdrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -3.7°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:52 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Fog dissipating. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:52 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
